channel.title: CVE Feed for Alsendo Sp. z o. o. -- Apaczka
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alsendo Sp. z o. o. -- Apaczka

item.title: CVE-2024-2759|2024-08-01T19:25:41.163Z -- alsendo%20sp.%20z%20o.%20o. -- apaczka
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Apaczka plugin for PrestaShop allows information gathering from saved templates without authentication.This issue affects Apaczka plugin for PrestaShop from v1 through v4.
